description:
Installation of five internally illuminated fascia signs, six non-illuminated vinyl signs and two non-illuminated sign (Advert Consent)
 Granted: - Sign A - Pets at home sign - LED illuminated sign with dimension 9.5m by 3.0m and 5.3m above ground level; Sign B - Where pets come first - LED illuminated sign with dimension 6.0m by 1.0m and 3.8 above ground level; Sign C - Projecting double sided sign - LED illuminated sign with dimension 2.4m by 1.4m and 3.3 above ground level; Sign D - Exterior glazing digitally printed; Sign E - Exterior glazing digitally printed; Sign F - Poster Frame - Non-illuminated poster cases 40" by 60"; Sign G - Rear exit door - Non-illuminated digitally printed; Sign H - Front Entrance Frosted vinyl 'paw' manifestations
 
 Refused: - Sign I1 - Vets4Pets Sign - LED illuminated sign with dimension 4.1m by 2.1m and 5.5m above ground level; Sign I2 - Groom Room Sign - LED illuminated sign with dimension 4.1m by 2.1m and 5.5m above ground level
 (Split Decision)
decision_conditions: 1. The consent shall expire after a period of 5 years from the date of this notice.  2. Any advertisements displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.  3. Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.  4. Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.  5. No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.  6. No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, waterway (including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military). | The number of proposed advertisements would result in an over concentration of advertisements and is considered to compromise the quality of the visual amenity of the surrounding Metropolitan Open Land and Green Corridor as such the following advertisements Sign I1 and Sign I2 LED illuminated signs with dimension 4.1m by 2.1m by 0.2m are contrary to policies 1, 2, 7, and 11 National Planning Policies Framework; 7.1, 7.4, 7.6, 7.17 of the London Plan 2011; 1.1, 1.2, 3.1, 3.6, 5.2, 5.3 and 5.4 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2026; 2.8, 4 and Policy 7B of Ealing Development Management Plan Document.
